[docs]
class DemoClass1:
    """
    DemoClass1 with detailed documentation for all features.

    Attributes
    ----------
    status : bool
        The status attribute.
    config : dict
        The config attribute.
    """

    def __init__(self, status, config):
        """
        Initializes DemoClass1 with a status and config.

        Parameters
        ----------
        status : bool
            The status attribute.
        config : dict
            The config attribute.
        """
        self.status = status
        self.config = config



[docs]
    def toggle_status(self):
        """
        Toggles the status attribute.

        Returns
        -------
        None
        """
        self.status = not self.status





[docs]
    def update_config(self, key, value):
        """
        Updates the config dictionary.

        Parameters
        ----------
        key : str
            The key to update.
        value : any
            The value to set.

        Returns
        -------
        None
        """
        self.config[key] = value







[docs]
class DemoClass2:
    """
    DemoClass2 with various methods and attributes.

    Attributes
    ----------
    name : str
        The name attribute.
    values : list
        The values attribute.
    """

    def __init__(self, name, values):
        """
        Initializes DemoClass2 with a name and values.

        Parameters
        ----------
        name : str
            The name attribute.
        values : list
            The values attribute.
        """
        self.name = name
        self.values = values



[docs]
    def append_value(self, value):
        """
        Appends a value to the values list.

        Parameters
        ----------
        value : any
            The value to append.

        Returns
        -------
        None
        """
        self.values.append(value)





[docs]
    def clear_values(self):
        """
        Clears the values list.

        Returns
        -------
        None
        """
        self.values.clear()
